Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-41110 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-41110 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 25.0.3-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 25.0.3-5, affected by CVE-2024-41110
